name: TestIndexJoinHavingExprInInnerJoinKeys
cases: select /*+ inl_join(t1, t2) */ * from t1 join t2 on t1.v_float = t2.v_int
select /*+ hash_join(t1, t2) */ * from t1 join t2 on t1.v_float = t2.v_int
select /*+ inl_join(t1, t2) */ * from t1 join t2 on t1.v_decimal = t2.v_int
select /*+ hash_join(t1, t2) */ * from t1 join t2 on t1.v_decimal = t2.v_int
